name: Modern Lounge Chair
description: A sleek and stylish lounge chair with a wooden frame. Padded armrests and a reclining feature offer superior comfort. Perfect for modern living rooms.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Adjustable height and lumbar support for all-day comfort. Breathable mesh back and soft cushioned seat. Ideal for long work hours.

name: Wooden Rocking Chair
description: Classic wooden rocking chair with smooth gliding motion. Handcrafted from solid oak for durability and strength. Perfect for relaxing in your living space.

name: Leather Recliner Chair
description: Luxurious leather upholstery with plush cushioning. Features a reclining function with adjustable headrest. Adds elegance to any room.

name: Velvet Accent Chair
description: Soft velvet fabric with a sturdy metal frame. Deep seat design with cushioned back for extra support. Great for accenting any room with a pop of color.

name: Outdoor Patio Chair
description: Weather-resistant materials perfect for outdoor settings. Sturdy steel frame with a breathable mesh seat. Stackable design for easy storage.

name: Swivel Gaming Chair
description: High backrest with lumbar and head support. 360-degree swivel function for mobility. Great for intense gaming sessions or working at a desk.

name: Bean Bag Chair
description: Filled with high-quality beads for ultimate relaxation. Soft, durable fabric that conforms to your body. Lightweight and easy to move around.

name: Wicker Dining Chair
description: Handwoven wicker with a natural finish. Comfortable cushioned seat with a removable cover. Perfect for indoor and outdoor dining.
